enb_long_title: Sixth Conference of the Parties to the UN Framework Convention on Climate Change
sentences: COP-6 was preceded by numerous formal and informal meetings and consultations held during 1999 and 2000.
The UNFCCC subsidiary bodies held their tenth sessions in Bonn, Germany, from 31 May - 11 June 1999, and began the formal process of fulfilling the Buenos Aires Plan of Action.
This work was continued at COP-5 and at the eleventh sessions of the subsidiary bodies, held in Bonn from 25 October - 5 November 1999.
During the first few months of 2000, several UNFCCC technical workshops on key issues under the Plan of Action were held to assist the process leading to COP-6.
